name: India
interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy and the birthplace of Hinduism, Buddhism, Jainism, and Sikhism.

name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline in the world.

name: United Kingdom
interestingFact: The UK is made up of four countries: England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.

name: Germany
interestingFact: Germany is known for its automobile industry and is home to BMW, Audi, and Volkswagen.

name: France
interestingFact: France is the largest country in the European Union.

name: Italy
interestingFact: Italy is famous for its art, fashion, and historical landmarks such as the Colosseum.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the largest coral reef system in the world.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is the largest country in South America and is famous for its Amazon Rainforest.

name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan is known for its technology and is the birthplace of many influential video game companies.

name: United States
interestingFact: The U.S. is home to the world's largest economy.

name: Russia
interestingFact: Russia is the largest country by land area in the world.

name: China
interestingFact: China is the most populous country in the world and has the world's second-largest economy.

name: South Africa
interestingFact: South Africa is known for its diverse cultures, languages, and history, including the fight against apartheid.

name: Mexico
interestingFact: Mexico is known for its ancient civilizations, including the Maya and Aztec.

name: Egypt
interestingFact: Egypt is home to one of the oldest civilizations in the world, including the famous pyramids of Giza.

name: Argentina
interestingFact: Argentina is the birthplace of the tango dance and music style.

name: Spain
interestingFact: Spain is known for its rich cultural heritage, including art, architecture, and flamenco dance.

name: Sweden
interestingFact: Sweden is known for its innovation, design, and high quality of life.

name: South Korea
interestingFact: South Korea is known for its advanced technology, pop culture (K-pop), and historical sites.

name: Nigeria
interestingFact: Nigeria is the most populous country in Africa and has one of the largest economies on the continent.

name: Indonesia
interestingFact: Indonesia is the largest archipelago in the world with over 17,000 islands.
